## TsConfigJson.CompilerOptions.strictBindCallApply property

Enable stricter checking of of the `bind`<!-- -->, `call`<!-- -->, and `apply` methods on functions.

 false

**Signature:**

```typescript
strictBindCallApply?: boolean;
```
